message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would greatly enhance your business or personal endeavors. This product holds significant value to me, but I understand its true worth to you might be different. Considering its exceptional quality and the impact it could have on your projects, I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $950,000. I believe this offer strikes a fair balance between acknowledging the product's value to both of us. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal. Kind regards, Alice
